byline.original: By DAVID M. HERSZENHORN and EMMARIE HUETTEMAN

abstract: Rep Paul D Ryan is elected 54th speaker of the House, youngest since 1860s, but is seen as having to pare his lofty goals to more limited aspirations as he faces divided government and big splits among House Republicans; his rise is seen as result of chaos in party, rather than electoral victory.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Ryan rocketed to political stardom with big plans, but he is likely to settle on modest goals as he seeks to repair the deep fractures in the House Republican caucus.

headline.main: As Speaker, Paul Ryan May Need to Pare Lofty Goals
headline.print_headline: As Speaker, Ryan May Need to Pare Lofty Goals

snippet: Mr. Ryan rocketed to political stardom with big plans, but he is likely to settle on modest goals as he seeks to repair the deep fractures in the House Republican caucus.
